title: P2P Advert List (request)
description: Returns available adverts for use with `p2p_order_create` .

advertiser_id.description: [Optional] ID of the advertiser to list adverts for.

advertiser_name.description: [Optional] Search for advertiser by name. Partial matches will be returned.

amount.description: [Optional] How much to buy or sell, used to calculate prices.

favourites_only.description: [Optional] Only show adverts from favourite advertisers. Default is 0.

local_currency.description: [Optional] Currency to conduct payment transaction in, defaults to the main currency for the client's country.

sort_by.description: [Optional] How the results are sorted: best rate, or advertiser completion rate.

use_client_limits.description: [Optional] If set to 1, ads that exceed this account's balance or turnover limits will not be shown.

passthrough.description: [Optional] Used to pass data through the websocket, which may be retrieved via the `echo_req` output field.

req_id.description: [Optional] Used to map request to response.
